title: Didn't receive the little demon Tristana icon.
body:
As the title states, I didn't receive the icon.
Not a big deal but just wondering why.

replies.body: One of the requirements for receiving the Little Demon Tristana icon is that you had to participate in the vote for Tristana's next skin (the vote occurred about 3 months ago, I believe). If you believe you should have received the icon but didn't, you can feel free to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can help.
